arn.description: The ARN of the Lightsail load balancer.

availabilityZone.description: The Availability Zone in which to create your disk.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the load balancer was created.

name.description: The name of the Lightsail load balancer.

sizeInGb.description: The instance port the load balancer will connect.

supportCode.description: The support code for the disk. Include this code in your email to support when you have questions about a disk in Lightsail. This code enables our support team to look up your Lightsail information more easily.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource. To create a key-only tag, use an empty string as the value. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

sizeInGb.description: The instance port the load balancer will connect.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Disk resources.
